THE 18TH ABDUCTION.author: by James Patterson and Maxine Paetro Little, Brown
THE 18TH ABDUCTION.description: The 18th book in the Women's Murder Club series. Lindsay Boxer investigates the disappearance of three female teachers.

WHERE THE CRAWDADS SING.author: by Delia Owens Putnam
WHERE THE CRAWDADS SING.description: In a quiet town on the North Carolina coast in 1969, a young woman who survived alone in the marsh becomes a murder suspect.

THE MISTER.author: by E L James Vintage
THE MISTER.description: Maxim Trevelyan inherits several estates and beds his cleaner Alessia Demachi, an Albanian piano prodigy who has been trafficked into England.

REDEMPTION.author: by David Baldacci Grand Central
REDEMPTION.description: The fifth book in the Memory Man series. The first man Amos Decker put behind bars asks to have his name cleared.

NEON PREY.author: by John Sandford Putnam
NEON PREY.description: The 29th book in the Prey series. Lucas Davenport goes after a serial killer.

PAST TENSE.author: by Lee Child Bantam/Dell
PAST TENSE.description: Jack Reacher explores the New England town where his father was born and a Canadian couple now find themselves stranded.

THE TATTOOIST OF AUSCHWITZ.author: by Heather Morris Harper
THE TATTOOIST OF AUSCHWITZ.description: A concentration camp detainee tasked with permanently marking fellow prisoners falls in love with one of them.

A GAME OF THRONES.author: by George R.R. Martin Bantam
A GAME OF THRONES.description: In the frozen wastes to the north of Winterfell, sinister and supernatural forces are mustering. Basis of the HBO series.

THE WOMAN IN THE WINDOW.author: by A.J. Finn Morrow
THE WOMAN IN THE WINDOW.description: A recluse who drinks heavily and takes prescription drugs may have witnessed a crime across from her Harlem townhouse.

SPYMASTER.author: by Brad Thor Emily Bestler/Atria
SPYMASTER.description: The 18th book in the Scot Harvath series. As a war looms, a counterterrorism operative takes on a new role his own way.
